pr_title: SONARJAVA-3531 S2187 should consider methods annotated with "@State" from Pact framework as test methods

timeline.message: Move test files to test sources

timeline.bodyText: Moving test files to a compiled module adds the constraint to not have duplicates. Let's take this as an occasion to rename classes with meaningful names.
timeline.author: quentin-jaquier-sonarsource

timeline.bodyText: We could take the chance to put all test files to checks.tests package instead.
timeline.author: quentin-jaquier-sonarsource
